rules_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, mill a card.
You may cast creature cards from your graveyard by paying {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} rather than paying their mana costs. Creatures cast this way enter with a finality counter on them.
flavor_text:
[i]“It lost a loved one, and it's trying to heal.”
—Eteres, planar analyst[/i]
